product_name: INDIE LEECoQ-10 Toner Hydrating Toning Mist
summary: SummaryIndie Lee CoQ-10 Toner is a hydrating toning mist that balances and refreshes your skin. Alcohol-free and formulated with antioxidant powerhouse CoQ-10, Aloe Vera and Cucumber, this non-drying skin spritzer primes and softens skin exposed to environmental aggressors.
details: DetailsBenefitsBalances and refreshes tired skinSmoothes and nourishes with powerful antioxidantsAlcohol free, non-drying formula primes and softensPH balanced to skin, providing hydration without dryingPrinted on FSC certified paperGreat for all skin typesKey IngredientsChamomile and Cucumber refreshAloe, Papaya and Sage smooth and clarifyCoQ-10 provides nutrients and powerful antioxidant benefitsHyaluronic Acid provides continuous moisture, binding up to 1,000 times its weight in waterFormulated WithoutAlways formulated without 1,300+ banned ingredients, including: Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfate-based detergents, Synthetic Fragrance, Petroleum-based ingredients, Phthalates, Phenoxyethanol, Formaldehyde and GMO ingredientsItem 2563188How To UseSpritz a cotton pad and apply to face and neck, morning and evening after cleansing. Can also spray directly onto the skin, avoiding eye area. Works great as a skin refresher after exercise or travel. For external use only.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Aloe Barbadensis, Ubiquinone (Coenzyme Q10), Hyaluronic Acid, Anthemis Nobilis (Roman Chamomile), Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Carica Papaya Leaf Extract, Cucums Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Flower Extract, Propanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spritz a cotton pad and apply to face and neck, morning and evening after cleansing. Can also spray directly onto the skin, avoiding eye area. Works great as a skin refresher after exercise or travel. For external use only.

reviews.headline: Skin flooding staple
reviews.comments: I adore this toner. It's honestly so slept on, which is great for me. It is a staple in my daily skincare routine while skin flooding.

reviews.headline: Toner perfection!
reviews.comments:
My store was clearancing this as they were no longer going to carry it IN THE STORE, so I decided to try it at a discount. OMG!  I am hooked on this toner and will pay full price for it. I have to get it shipped so I order before I  run out.
It smells amazing,  fresh,  and makes my skin look amazing. My skin wakes up and the rest of my products go on perfectly on top.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for years. It has a very lovely nice plant based scent, no synthetic fragrance. Very hydrating and soothing. Grateful for prepping skin for serum and moisturizer. Non-acne and non-irritating. Great for redness as well. Great for post laser treatment.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for years. It has a very lovely nice plant based scent, no synthetic fragrance. Very hydrating and soothing. Grateful for prepping skin for serum and moisturizer. Non-acne and non-irritating. Great for redness as well. Great for post laser treatment.

reviews.headline: One of the few things that actually works for me
reviews.comments: My skin is sensitive and acne prone, but it's always at its best when I incorporate this toner into my skincare routine. I love it!

reviews.headline: Will repurchase this forever
reviews.comments: I have repurchaed this for me and my husband like 5 timez already and we love it!! Weirdly enough i love that it comes in a soray bottle and make the experience very hygienic. The glass bottle is extremely nice. For us, we like the scent but its a very fresh scent that goes away pretty quickly. My husband has eczema and doesn't irritate his skin at all

reviews.headline: Can't stand this stuff
reviews.comments: The smell of this toner is really strong and not that great. I'm used to fragrance free products, and this toner feels like applying perfume on my face. After using it for a week, I can't stand it anymore, so I switched to applying it on my body because I can no longer return. I'm disappointed and lot more cautious now in buying products without testing them in the store first!

reviews.headline: This stuff…
reviews.comments: Never write product reviews. But felt compelled to for this. CoQ10 is an effective treatment and in this amazing smelling spray you just want to keep using it. I would someday like to bathe in it.

reviews.headline: Estie approved toner✔️
reviews.comments: I ordered this when it was on sale to use as a back up when i was done my usual toner and absolutely feel in love with it. As an acne prone girlie i love that its limited ingredients and free of pore cloggers. The scent is a little over powering at first but you get used to it

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Smells good and feels nice on my skin. Recommend

reviews.headline: Perfect facial spray/toner
reviews.comments: Love spraying this on my face. Smells amazing and ingredient list is safe/nontoxic to the body.

reviews.headline: Perfect toner for sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: I have extremely sensitive skin and have never found a toner that works for me without drying out my skin. I love that this is free of alcohol and has only clean ingredients! It also has a very light refreshing scent. My skin feels so clean after using it. Indie has the best skin care line!

reviews.headline: A Staple for years now
reviews.comments: I have an oily t-zone and acne prone skin.  With regular use it keeps my acne at bay, and gives my skin a healthy glow.

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin & Cystic acne approved ✅
reviews.comments: My cycstic acne is one of my biggest obstacles. Finding skincare products that heal, but dont make me breakout more is extremely tedious to find. I have been using this for 3 years now. Its soothing and calming. I love using it after applying  my acne medication and any harsh products. Absolutely give it a try!

reviews.headline: absolute favorite toner!!
reviews.comments: I am a skincare junkie and love trying a variety of products, so much so that I often don't finish a product before I've moved on to try something new. This is the first product that I used, down to the last drop, in as long as I can remember. I was shocked waking up the first morning after using as part of my nightly routine the night before. my skin has never felt so hydrated, soft, and supple. I much prefer spray toners to pouring some on a cotton round, so the ease & eco-friendliness of the spray bottle is a major plus. I recommend to anyone looking for a new staple to their skincare routine.

reviews.headline: best toner i've tried!
reviews.comments: i made the switch because i wanted something more hydrating that was not oily. and i am never changing! it has been a week and my skin is more hydrating, cleaner, and brighter! the only thing i wish it had was a more of a finer mist. i either use a cotton pad or spray it on my hands and pat it in.

reviews.headline: Excellent spray toner
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this spray toner.  Makes my face feel hydrated and clean.

reviews.headline: New Skincare Stable !
reviews.comments: Husband and I both love this facial spray. It's lightweight, resfreshing, and luxurious feeling. We both have sensitive skin and this toner doesn't irritate or dry out our skin which is a hard find for something that works for us both. New stable and excited to repurchase

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I only bought this porduct oroginally because it was part of ulta's 50% off sale, but i would buy again and again at the full price. I've been using it twice a day for almost 6 months and still not out, worth every penny.

reviews.headline: All time favorite toner!
reviews.comments: It's so refreshing, makes my skin feel so clean and fresh and it only takes a little to make a big difference.

media.headline: Amazing I could cry
media.caption: Running low so had to restock

media.headline: Best FabFitFun item I've ever received!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have tried soooo many different toners from Strivectin, youth to the people, ordinary, biosance, derma e, glow recipe, Lancôme (which I do love the pink one) to a lot of Korean ones like pyunkang yul that Cassandra Banskson likes but made me break out, sulwhasoo (isn't Korean but still,  the rose water from Mamonde is really really good tho & more others… that's from the top of my head of what I can think of. My mom & cousin are into skincare so I got into it & my cousin owns a Korean makeup/skincare store so yea I tried too many but this one here…. THIS IS THE ONE!!! I will forever buy this one. The spray is perfect, it doesn't spit out like some others, it's so hydrating & refreshing. I have not gotten any breakouts from it & it calms my skin soooo well!!! The ingredients are the best part!!! It has the best ingredients & this is actually what you need for your skin!!! I use this & Acure whipping cream which has tons of peptides & basically the best dupe for DE protini! It has alsmot the same great ingredients (the good ones) & I use the B oil from Strivectin & mix it together with the Acure after I use this toner. My face feels & looks sooo good when I wake up!!!! Trust me.,, you need this! It's the best!!! I'm so happy I researched. I always passed on this but I regret not getting it sooner cuz this is the one!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: This is the ONE!

faceoff_negative.comments:
So surprised by this because I've never had reactive or sensitive skin. My skin usually takes whatever you throw at it in stride. But this gave me irritation bumps and small whiteheads that eventually led to full blown acne- which I also don't normally have an issue with save a random, ocassional spot. Took me a while to figure out this was the cause, but this toner is definitely the culprit.

 Tried to reincorporate it back into my routine a couple of times and even with just one use, I get reactions anywhere from immediate redness and heat in my face upon application to little irritation bumps sprinkled over my temples, cheeks and nose a few hours later. My skin just flat out doesn't like it. I don't find it at all hydrating either- actually makes my skin feel drier.
faceoff_negative.headline: Irritated Skin, Caused Acne
